/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The vantage point is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street below is a hive of activity, with cars and buses navigating their way through the city's arteries. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades bathed in the soft glow of the setting sun. The sky above is a clear blue, offering a stark contrast to the earthy tones of the cityscape. The sun is on the horizon, casting long shadows and bathing the scene in a warm, inviting light.
